content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler and Offshore Pump System at position(-10.5, 26.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-10.5, 25.5)
- Boiler at position (-10.5, 26.5)
- Small Electric Pole at position (-11.5, 26.5)

### Pipe Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe at position (-10.5, 23.5)
- Pipe at position (-10.5, 24.5)
- Pipe at position (-11.5, 24.5)
- Pipe at position (-12.5, 25.5)
- Pipe at position (-12.5, 24.5)

### Electricity Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Poles at positions (-15.5, 24.5), (-13.5, 24.5), (-13.5, 25.5), (-14.5, 25.5), (-15.5, 25.5), and (-14.5, 24.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a pipe. Check surrounding entities to confirm the area is clear.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.
